'''''Good Thing I'm a Cut Above''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must destroy a total of 8 Radiant Reflections created by the [[Wayward Hermetic Spiritspeaker]] during a single challenge.
